mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, userpw, username, birth, email, phone, point, userdel, lvcode) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{phone}, 0, 0, 1)
mapper.select: select * from user a, userlv b where a.lvcode = b.lvcode and a.userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update user set userpw = #{userpw}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}
